system.availability: Ends ongoing (positive or negative) effects of drugs/toxins/gases unless stated otherwise. Character is stunned for 1d10-TB (Toughness Bonus) Rounds, a result of 0 means no side-effects
system.cost: Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.
